name: appsec
description: Comprehensive application security toolbox for Claude Code. 62 skills across 8 frameworks (OWASP Top 10, OWASP API Top 10, STRIDE, PASTA, LINDDUN, MITRE ATT&CK, SANS/CWE Top 25, DREAD), red team simulation with 6 attacker personas plus consolidator, and interactive security education.
